title: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: Naruto is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Masashi Kishimoto. It tells the story of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village. The story is in two parts, the first set in Naruto's pre-teen years, and the second in his teens.

title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: One Piece follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew as they search for the One Piece treasure to become the Pirate King. The series is known for its world-building, diverse characters, and epic battles.

title: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: Attack on Titan is set in a world where humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the sudden appearance of the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures who devour humans seemingly without reason. The story centers on Eren Yeager, his adoptive sister Mikasa Ackerman, and their friend Armin Arlert, whose lives are changed forever after a Colossal Titan breaches the wall of their home town.

title: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: Dragon Ball follows the adventures of Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven orbs known as the Dragon Balls, which summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered.

title: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
Takeshi Obata
description: Death Note follows high school student Light Yagami who discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it. As Light decides to use the Death Note to rid the world of criminals, he becomes known as the vigilante Kira, drawing the attention of law enforcement and a mysterious detective known only as L.

title: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: My Hero Academia is set in a world where nearly everyone has superpowers known as Quirks. The story follows Izuku Midoriya, a Quirkless boy who dreams of becoming a Hero. After a fateful encounter with the legendary hero All Might, Izuku inherits his Quirk and enrolls in a prestigious hero academy where he faces challenges and grows alongside his classmates.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Fullmetal Alchemist follows the journey of brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric who use alchemy in their quest to find the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment. Their journey reveals deep conspiracies and challenges their understanding of alchemy and the world.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
author: Sui Ishida
description: Tokyo Ghoul is set in a world where ghouls, creatures who look like humans but need to eat human flesh to survive, live among humans in secrecy. The story follows Ken Kaneki, a college student who becomes a half-ghoul after a near-fatal encounter with one. As he navigates this new life, he struggles with his identity and the moral complexities of being part of both worlds.

title: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: Bleach follows the adventures of Ichigo Kurosaki, a teenager with the ability to see ghosts. After gaining the powers of a Soul Reaper—a death personification similar to the Grim Reaper—Ichigo is tasked with protecting the living world from malevolent spirits known as Hollows and guiding departed souls to the afterlife.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: Demon Slayer follows Tanjiro Kamado, a young boy who becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered by demons and his younger sister Nezuko is turned into a demon. Tanjiro sets out on a journey to avenge his family and find a cure for Nezuko while battling powerful demons and uncovering the secrets of the demon-slaying corps.

title: Hunter x Hunter
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: Hunter x Hunter follows Gon Freecss, a young boy who discovers that his father, who he believed to be dead, is actually a world-renowned Hunter, a licensed profession for those who specialize in fantastic pursuits such as locating rare or unidentified animal species, treasure hunting, surveying unexplored enclaves, or hunting down lawless individuals.

title: Yu Yu Hakusho
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: Yu Yu Hakusho follows Yusuke Urameshi, a teenage delinquent who is struck and killed by a car while attempting to save a child's life. After a number of tests presented to him by Koenma, the son of the ruler of the afterlife Underworld, Yusuke is revived and appointed the title of Underworld Detective, with which he must investigate various cases involving demons and apparitions in the human world.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
author: Hirohiko Araki
description: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure follows the Joestar family, starting with Jonathan Joestar, as they encounter supernatural foes and develop unique powers known as Stands. Each part of the series follows a different member of the Joestar lineage and their adventures across generations.

title: Black Clover
author: Yūki Tabata
description: Black Clover follows Asta and Yuno, two orphans who were raised together from birth in a church on the outskirts of the Clover Kingdom. In a world where everyone has the natural ability to perform magic, Asta is the only person born without the ability to use magic, making him an anomaly. Despite this, he still dreams of becoming the Wizard King, the strongest magic user in the Clover Kingdom.

title: Promised Neverland
author: Kaiu Shirai
Posuka Demizu
description: The Promised Neverland follows a group of orphans who discover that their caretaker is not what she seems and plan an escape after learning the dark truth about their existence.

title: Haikyu!!
author: Haruichi Furudate
description: Haikyu!! follows Shoyo Hinata, a high school student determined to become a great volleyball player despite his small stature. Inspired by a national championship match he sees on TV, Hinata joins his school's volleyball team, where he meets Tobio Kageyama, a talented and competitive player.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
author: Gege Akutami
description: Jujutsu Kaisen follows Yuji Itadori, a high school student who becomes involved in the world of curses and jujutsu after consuming a cursed object to protect his friends. He joins Tokyo Metropolitan Magic Technical College to learn jujutsu and fight curses.

title: Solo Leveling
author: Chugong
DUBU (Redice Studio)
description: Solo Leveling follows Sung Jin-Woo, the weakest hunter, who one day stumbles across a hidden dungeon with the difficulty of a higher rank hunter. Over time, Sung Jin-Woo's growth as a hunter begins to skyrocket, thus becoming a true S-rank hunter.

title: Black Butler
author: Yana Toboso
description: Black Butler follows Ciel Phantomhive, a thirteen-year-old boy head of the Phantomhive household, an aristocratic family known as the Queen's Guarddog. He is tasked with solving crimes in London's underworld with his demon butler Sebastian Michaelis.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
author: Nakaba Suzuki
description: The Seven Deadly Sins follows the adventures of Elizabeth, the third princess of the Kingdom of Liones, and her search for the Seven Deadly Sins to help her take back the kingdom from the Holy Knights.

title: Nanatsu no Taizai
author: Nakaba Suzuki
description: Nanatsu no Taizai follows the adventures of Elizabeth, the third princess of the Kingdom of Liones, and her search for the Seven Deadly Sins to help her take back the kingdom from the Holy Knights.

title: Tokyo Revengers
author: Ken Wakui
description: Tokyo Revengers follows Takemichi Hanagaki, who learns that his middle school girlfriend Hinata Tachibana and her younger brother Naoto Tachibana have died at the hands of the Tokyo Manji Gang. Takemichi discovers that he can travel in time to change the tragic future by altering the past.

title: Chainsaw Man
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
description: Chainsaw Man follows Denji, a young man with the ability to transform into a chainsaw-wielding demon. After accumulating a considerable amount of debt, Denji works as a devil hunter to repay it and live a better life. His life changes drastically when he encounters a powerful devil.

title: Fire Force
author: Atsushi Ōkubo
description: Fire Force follows Shinra Kusakabe, a third-generation pyrokinetic youth who is commonly known as a devil's footprints and joins Special Fire Force Company 8 to fight Infernals, beings from another dimension who cause spontaneous human combustion.

title: Beastars
author: Paru Itagaki
description: Beastars is set in a world of modern, civilized anthropomorphic animals with a cultural divide between carnivores and herbivores. The series takes its name from the in-universe rank of Beastar, an individual of great talent, service, and notoriety.

title: Spy x Family
author: Tatsuya Endo
description: Spy x Family follows a master spy who has to build a family in order to execute his mission. He adopts a young girl and enters into a fake marriage with an assassin to create a disguise for his spy activities.

title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
author: Fuse
Mitz Vah
description: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime follows Satoru Mikami, a corporate worker who is reincarnated as a powerful slime in a fantasy world. With his newfound abilities and knowledge, he embarks on a journey to create a world where all species can live together in harmony.

title: Re:Zero
author: Tappei Nagatsuki
Shinichirou Otsuka
description: Re:Zero follows Subaru Natsuki, an ordinary high school student who is transported to another world where he discovers that he has the ability to 'Return by Death,' which allows him to go back in time whenever he dies. Subaru uses this ability to save his friends and uncover the mysteries of the world he's in.
